signal_description: From the table named 'defaultview-225', select the following columns: 'Inv. Company Code', 'Inv. Company Code Text', the count of distinct case_id values, 'Last Inv. Item Vendor Master Payment Terms', and 'Last Inv. Item Terms of Payment Key'.
